verses.verse: Make a joyful <S%H7321>shout<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> all the <S%H776>earth!<s%>
Sing <S%H2167>to<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H8034>name!<s%> <S%H7760>Offer<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H8416>praise!<s%>

<S%H559>Tell<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> "How <S%H3372>awesome<s%> are your <S%H4639>deeds!<s%> Through the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of your <S%H5797>power,<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> submit themselves to <S%H3584>you.<s%>
All the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H2167>you,<s%> and will sing to <S%H2167>you;<s%> they will sing to your <S%H8034>name.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4659>deeds<s%>â€” <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H4659>work<s%> on behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> into <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H5674>land.<s%> They went through the <S%H5104>river<s%> on <S%H7272>foot.<s%> <S%H8055>There,<s%> we rejoiced in him.

He <S%H4910>rules<s%> by his <S%H1369>might<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> <S%H5637>Don't<s%> let the rebellious rise <S%H7311>up<s%> against <S%H5542>him.<s%> Selah.
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H5971>peoples!<s%> Make the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H8085>heard,<s%>
who <S%H7760>preserves<s%> our <S%H5315>life<s%> among the <S%H2416>living,<s%> and <S%H5414>doesn't<s%> allow our <S%H7272>feet<s%> to be <S%H4132>moved.<s%>
For <S%H430>you,<s%> God, have <S%H974>tested<s%> <S%H6884>us.<s%> You have refined <S%H3701>us,<s%> as silver is <S%H6884>refined.<s%>
You <S%H935>brought<s%> us into <S%H4686>prison.<s%> You <S%H7760>laid<s%> a <S%H4157>burden<s%> on our <S%H4975>backs.<s%>

You allowed <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H7392>ride<s%> over our <S%H7218>heads.<s%> We <S%H935>went<s%> through <S%H784>fire<s%> and through <S%H4325>water,<s%> but you brought us <S%H3318>to<s%> the place of <S%H7310>abundance.<s%>
I will <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H1004>temple<s%> with burnt <S%H5930>offerings.<s%> I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my vows to <S%H5088>you,<s%>
which my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6475>promised,<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H6475>spoke,<s%> when I was in <S%H6862>distress.<s%>

I will <S%H5927>offer<s%> to you burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> of fat <S%H4220>animals,<s%> with the <S%H7004>offering<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> I will <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H1241>bulls<s%> with <S%H6260>goats.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear,<s%> all you who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> what he has <S%H6213>done<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to him with my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> He was <S%H7311>extolled<s%> <S%H8478>with<s%> my <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
If I cherished sin in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> the Lord <S%H136>wouldn't<s%> have listened.
But most <S%H403>certainly,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8085>listened.<s%> He has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H430>God,<s%> who has not turned <S%H5493>away<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> nor his loving kindness from <S%H2617>me.<s%>
